text: 1.9 Lom 8.28, Epe 1.4, 2.8-9, 1 Te 4.7, Tat 3.5, Hib 3.1, 1 Pi 1.20 God chɨnop tɨg asɨk dɨl aglek, binɨb ne ke yɨbɨl mɨdɨl, yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl mɨdobun. Pen chɨn gɨtep gonok nɨŋɨd aglɨl ma dak. Ne ke aglɨl yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gin agɨl gos nɨŋɨd, chɨnop dak. Bɨlel man ma alwol gɨlak ñɨn ak, God ne anɨgɨl gos nɨgak, Klays Jisas wog ne gek, yad kɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gɨnɨgayn agɨl gos nɨgak.
